resources.string: Try this: curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: key=api_key" -X POST -d \'{"data"{"message":"Hello World."},"to":"/topics/global"}\' https://android.googleapis.com/gcm/send
An error occurred while either fetching the InstanceID token, sending the fetched token to the server or subscribing to the PubSub topic. Please try running the sample again.
